info.title: Flowcept Webservice API
info.description: Read-only REST API for Flowcept provenance data. Provides workflows, tasks, and objects endpoints with query support.

schema.title: Response Live Api V1 Health Live Get
Response Ready Api V1 Health Ready Get

get.description: List workflows with optional basic filters.

schema.title: Response Get Workflow Api V1 Workflows  Workflow Id  Get

post.description: Run an advanced read-only workflows query.
Generate and download a workflow provenance card markdown file.

get.description: List tasks with optional basic filters.

schema.title: Response Get Task Api V1 Tasks  Task Id  Get

post.description: Run an advanced read-only task query.

get.description: List objects with optional basic filters.
Get latest version of an object by id.

schema.title: Response Get Object Api V1 Objects  Object Id  Get

get.description: Get a specific object version by id and version number.

schema.title: Response Get Object Version Api V1 Objects  Object Id  Versions  Version  Get

get.description: Download a specific object payload version as binary.

post.description: Run an advanced read-only object query.

schema.title: Response Get Dataset Api V1 Datasets  Object Id  Get
Response Get Dataset Version Api V1 Datasets  Object Id  Versions  Version  Get
Response Get Model Api V1 Models  Object Id  Get
Response Get Model Version Api V1 Models  Object Id  Versions  Version  Get

ListResponse.title: ListResponse
ListResponse.description: Generic list envelope for collection endpoints.

ObjectQueryRequest.title: ObjectQueryRequest
ObjectQueryRequest.description: Object query payload with optional payload inclusion.
